_xResult.title: Must Haves Grey Linen Pants
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made grey pants with pocket
_xResult.longdesc:
Take a chance on these custom made linen pants! Perfect for summer errands or fall markets, these pants were made with the finest craftmanship. Style it any way you'd like, preferably with a tighter top. You'll be comfortable all day—and look killer!

 

These pants have an asymmetrical cut at the bottom hem and appear as a maxi skirt when you walk just right. For a fun styling tip, tie the extra fabric around your ankles as Aiste does in the photos to create a cropped pant. 

 

You need pants made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
